name: Card Babble
description:
Real-time card battle game. It's in a slightly rough state...

Controls:

  • Left-click / Space bar to select.

Gameplay:

  • Draw from the deck.
  • Your cards are your health.
  • Stars: Resource cards. Click them to play them. Click again when in play for energy.
  • Other shapes: Creature cards. Click them to play them, click again to attack.
  • Numbers at the top of the cards dictate how much energy playing the card/activating the card cots.
